tier.item: (15a) Mai nyuntumpa ngarinyi? Ngayulu mai wiya.
food yours liePRES I food NEG

tier.item: (19b) B: Wati, nyaaku-na tjitjingku palku punytjanma? Yuwa-ni
man why-I childERG not really bluntPOT giveIMP-me

and I'll be off with it.'

tier.item: 20a. A: Wati, nyangangi-na-nta! Wati, nyaa manti-n yanu?
man seePAST.IMPF-I-you man what probably-you goPAST
`Man, I've been watching you. Man, what would you've been
after? Randy was it? Off to see a woman, was it?'

man seePAST.IMPF-I-you man what probably-you goPAST

tier.item: 'The wild plum is truly a bush-food. It's similar to the quondong.
It's one of a pair with the quondong.'
'The wild plum is truly a bush-food. It's similar to the quondong.
It's one of a pair with the quondong.'
The wild plum is truly a bush-food. It's similar to the quondong. It's one of a pair with the quondong.
